refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns a sub-set of a given range

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
index
The index at which the sub-set starts.
If positive, the set will start at that index in the set. If negative, the set will start that far from the end.
length
If a length is given and is positive, the resulting set will have up to that many values in it.
If the length results in an overflow, only values up to the end of the set will be included.
If a length is given and is negative, the set will stop that many values from the end.
If a length is not provided, the resulting set will contain all values between the index and the end of the set.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
A sub-set of the given range.
